briefTitle: Long Term Results of the Canadian Breast IMRT Study
officialTitle: Long Term Outcomes of a Multicentre Controlled Clinical Trial of Breast Irradiation Using Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Chronic breast pain using Visual Analog Scale
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients treated in the Canadian Phase 3 randomised controlled trial breast IMRT trial

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients declining participating to this study
* Patients unable to travel to the study site
* Patients deceased
